Package doerfer

Class DummyTile

java.lang.Object
doerfer.preset.Tile
doerfer.AdvancedTile
doerfer.DummyTile
public class DummyTile extends AdvancedTile
Class DummyTile Implements a dummy-tile. It is used around already placed tile to indicate, if one could place a tile. Also, one should be able to click on them to place a tile. Is able to return a DrawableTile, which is just grey. Rotation in the tilePlacement of the DummyTile is always 0, as the system is setting this kind of tiles and its symmetric
Author:
Jannis Fischer

  • Field Details

    • tilePlacement

      private final doerfer.preset.TilePlacement tilePlacement
      TilePlacement to save the position of the DummyTile, so be able to show it easily. As there isn't a player setting this kind of tile, the playerID is -1

      private boolean activated
      Boolean to save if the DummyTile can be clicked or not and shown or not
